Excellent! Run fast, my good lass! A hunt is only as good as the chase it gives!
Winston, my dear man. If you would be so kind as to release the hounds, I do believe we can get started.
Looks like we've lost the trail.
No matter, we'll set up camp here and resume the hunt presently!
